title: Doll Dungeon - Novel Updates
tags: Automatons   Chat Rooms   Clever Protagonist   Dolls/Puppets   Dungeon Master   Dungeons   Game Elements   Golems   Male Protagonist   R-15   Transported to Another World
author: 神咲　炎楼
description:
When I woke up I was in a room that I didn’t recognize.

This is the eventful life of a dungeon master!

But contrary to expectations, it’s an unexpectedly laid-back (?) tale of a man walking the life of a dungeon master.>
